div.bibl: Associated Oriental Press, Vol. VII, No. 22, Dec. 20, 1936. FOR BEST CONNECTIONS

body.p: A Philippine-American Agency is steadily acquiring the best connections. Such a thing had never been accomplished before by any Filipino or business organization here in Chicago. It is worth while for every Filipino here as well as those of the different cities throughout the country to inquire as to "who is who" of the Agency and its business integrity.
Find put about their square dealings in all business transactions. And above all how the Agency may serve you best.
Any particular information in business will be given without obligation.
